column3: EIT Digital Master School - Eötvös Lorand University
column5: FinTech is a disruptive juggernaut – one that is fundamentally changing everything from how we bank and invest to how we buy insurance. It is even redefining how we pay for everyday goods and services.Despite the transformational impact FinTech has already had, the rapid development of machine learning, data analytics, and blockchain technology is rewriting what is possible. These technologies will soon revolutionise how we approach credit and risk management, identity protection, data security, and portfolio allocation.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
